items.title: Implementation
items.subtitle: From Ramp to Autonomy
items.description: Cortex isn't installed — it evolves. Our implementation strategy reflects this transformation, guiding factories from hands-on integration to full self-regulation.

items.label: Ramp Phase
items.value: During ramp, Anim8 engineers work shoulder-to-shoulder with your team. Together we tune logic, build workflows, and dial in every interaction.

items.label: Stabilization
items.value: As Cortex stabilizes, the spotlight shifts. Client engineers take more control, our team fades back. The system starts to breathe on its own.

items.label: Autonomy
items.value: Cortex now predicts and adapts. Operators monitor instead of intervene. It’s not just software anymore — it’s your factory’s second brain.
Cortex isn’t a self-install. It’s a co-creation. Our data engineers come from the factory floor.
We speak the language of torque curves, station cycle time, and stack-up variation. We don’t just code. We understand manufacturing at its core.
We’re not just devs — we’re builders. Cortex exists because we built it with you, not for you.

items.title: Why It Works
items.subtitle: A System Built on First Principles
items.description: Cortex is engineered, not configured. Our foundation is not trend, but principle. Every decision in our system flows from physics, data, and logic.

items.label: Physics-based root cause logic
items.value: We trace issues to their physical origin — not symptoms.

items.label: Unbiased tech stack
items.value: No vendor lock-in. We choose the right tool for the job every time.

items.label: Statistical & empirical methods
items.value: Built-in rigor to validate outcomes and decisions.

items.label: Polyglot data handling
items.value: Seamless fusion of structured, semi-structured, and unstructured data, continuously improved.

items.title: Commissioning
items.subtitle: The Analogy
items.description: You wouldn’t expect a robot to install itself and run OEE flawlessly on Day 1. Why should software be any different?

items.value: Traditional manufacturing lines go through a meticulous commissioning process: mechanical installation, logic programming, interface tuning, and gradual ramp-up. Cortex follows the same philosophy.

Unlike traditional plug-and-play tools, Cortex is designed like a line — customized, integrated, and evolved alongside your operations. It’s not just software — it’s the cognitive control system of your factory.
